title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Photos along the trail
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Chilkoot Trail     Photos along the trail              Photos along the Chilkoot Trail         NPS image  Explore the Chilkoot Trail through these collections of photos.  The galleries are organized starting at the U.S. trailhead and ending at Lake Bennett.  Â                 Trailhead to Finnegan's Point   18 Photos             Finnegan's Point   13 Photos             Finnegan's Point to Canyon City   4 Photos              Canyon City Campground   11 Photos             Canyon City to Pleasant Camp   7 Photos            Pleasant Camp   7 Photos              Sheep Camp   9 Photos             Long Hill   11 Photos             Scales to Summit   21 Photos              Summit warming hut   4 Photos             Summit to Happy Camp   13 Photos             Happy Camp   7 Photos              Happy Camp to Deep Lake   6 Photos             Deep Lake   9 Photos             Deep Lake to Lindeman City   5 Photos                    Prev    1   2   of 2  Next
